definitions: To identify someone or something from having encountered them before; to know again.
To acknowledge the existence, validity, or legality of something.
To show appreciation for an achievement or service.
To perceive or admit the truth or fact of something.
examples: I didn't recognize her at first with her new haircut.
The United Nations recognized the new government.
The company recognized his years of service with a special award.
He had to recognize his own mistakes.
